com.kontakt.sdk.android.ble.connection

Interface SyncableKontaktDeviceConnection


  • public interface SyncableKontaktDeviceConnection
    Syncable Kontakt device connection combines KontaktDeviceConnection and KontaktCloud functionality. The syncable connection allows for immediate pushes to both Bluetooth and its representation in Kontakt.io Web API.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Writes secure config and tries to sync with REST API
